verses.name: Jeremiah 48:16
verses.text: The calamity of Moab is near to come, and his affliction hasteth fast.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:17
verses.text: All ye that are about him, bemoan him; and all ye that know his name, say, How is the strong staff broken, and the beautiful rod!

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:18
verses.text: Thou daughter that dost inhabit Dibon, come down from thy glory, and sit in thirst; for the spoiler of Moab shall come upon thee, and he shall destroy thy strong holds.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:19
verses.text: O inhabitant of Aroer, stand by the way, and espy; ask him that fleeth, and her that escapeth, and say, What is done?
